title: Donate
text:
=======


Donate


Your support makes a big difference in our community. We are in the process of integrating a secure online donation platform. Please check back soon for the ability to donate online.


In the meantime, if you’d like to contribute or have questions about other ways to donate, please contact us at abisharat@culturalhealthconnect.org.



© 2025 Cultural Health Connect

title: Cultural Health Connect
Our Programs
text:
Our Programs


Community Workshops


Join our free educational sessions covering topics from nutrition and lifestyle modifications to chronic disease management, all designed with cultural sensitivity in mind.


Outreach Initiatives


We partner with local clinics, cultural organizations, and community leaders to deliver accessible health resources and education tailored to our community’s needs.


Volunteer Opportunities


Get involved with our dynamic team. Whether you’re passionate about community service or healthcare, there are many ways to help.


Upcoming Events


Stay updated on our upcoming events including health fairs, cultural community gatherings, and interactive workshops.



© 2025 Cultural Health Connect

title: About Us
text:
About Cultural Health Connect


Cultural Health Connect was founded with the aim of bridging cultural gaps in healthcare. We are dedicated to providing culturally relevant health and lifestyle education to immigrant communities in East County San Diego. Our mission is to empower community members by integrating traditional cultural values with modern healthcare practices.


Our Founders


Details about our founders and their inspiring journeys will be shared soon. Stay tuned as we introduce the passionate individuals behind Cultural Health Connect.



© 2025 Cultural Health Connect
